hk.edu.polyu.comp.comp2021.g17.cvfs.model.file

Class File

  • java.lang.Object
    • hk.edu.polyu.comp.comp2021.g17.cvfs.model.file.File
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Directory, Document

    public abstract class File
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class File representing file objects. A File can be either Document or Directory
    See Also:
    File, Document

    • Constructor Detail

      • File

        protected File(FileType fileType,
               java.lang.String name,
               int size,
               java.lang.Object content)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor to be used by its child classes
        Parameters:
        fileType - Type of the file to be constructed, either Document or Directory
        name - Name of the file with constraints.
        size - Size of the file to be constructed.
        content - Content of the file. @see content
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - This exception shall be thrown when the name passed does not meet the constraints specified
        See Also:
        FileType
